${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Did you know, 50% of consumers are interested in receiving personalized financial?¹ Everybody does it: we use digital to shop online, listen to music, stream TV shows, order food and even track our health or fitness habits.
Each of those experiences is highly personalized based on our habits, preferences and purchases.
Banking shouldn’t be any different. Yet many financial institutions are still working in silos—making it difficult to offer truly personalized experiences from one channel to the next.
How can {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}} solve this and take your personalization efforts to the next level so customers engage more and stay loyal? Download the whitepaper to find out. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> P.S. Want to dive deeper and hear from actual financial institutions? Register for our webinar on 7/28: Beyond the Basics: Personalization in a Digital-First World.
